title: Create a Health Check System
description: Build a comprehensive health check system that monitors database, cache, and external services.
instructions:
Create a HealthChecker class that:

1. Defines a HealthCheck result class with name, status, latency, and error
2. Implements checkDatabase() that tests database connectivity
3. Implements checkCache() that tests Redis/cache connectivity
4. Implements checkAll() that runs all checks and returns aggregate status
5. Calculates overall system health based on individual check results
6. Handles timeouts gracefully (max 5 seconds per check)

hints.text: Use Stopwatch to measure latency. Start it before the operation and stop it after.
Use Future.wait() to run checks in parallel. This is more efficient than running them sequentially.
For timeout handling, use .timeout(duration) on the Future and catch TimeoutException.

commonMistakes.mistake: Running health checks sequentially instead of in parallel
commonMistakes.consequence: Health check takes 10+ seconds instead of 5 seconds max
commonMistakes.correction: Use Future.wait() to run all checks concurrently

commonMistakes.consequence: Health checks hang indefinitely if a service is unresponsive
commonMistakes.correction: Always wrap checks with .timeout() and handle TimeoutException
